text: Blindheim (); ; traditionally known in English as Blenheim ( ), is a municipality in the Bavarian district of Dillingen in southern Germany, containing of several villages. It is north of Augsburg, on the left bank of the Danube River. Its population is about 1,700. For administrative purposes, it is affiliated with the municipal association of Höchstädt an der Donau. ==Related pages== * Blenheim Palace * Blenheim, New Zealand ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of the Municipality of Blindheim * Google Earth view of Blindheim and around Category:Dillingen (district)
title: Blindheim
